cards.rules_text:
Flying
Dash {1}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]

{T}: Add {R}
{1}, {T}: The next creature you cast has dash. The dash cost is equal to its mana cost.
Deal 4 damage to up to two target creatures
cards.flavor_text: [i]Out of the way buddy! I'll lose sight of Sonic![/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and first strike until end of turn.
Deal 1 damage to each creature your opponents control without flying. Creatures dealt damage this way can't block this turn.
Put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn, and is returned to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Abilities you activate that aren't mana abilities cost {R} less to activate.
{T}: Add one mana of any color

This deck Dashes in its creatures to hit fast, but then the creatures return to your hand at the end of the turn. Finding the right balance of early game attacks while playing your creatures so that they stick around is key to winning with this aggressive strategy.
